author: mmusich
body:
With this PR:
   * fix the issue with copying back the output plots introduced in #18749.
   * introduce automatic adjustment of probe track pT cut with B=0T
   * introduce profile plots of vertex residuals as a function of track pT
   * introduce sanity checks on the number of bins used in the validation before attempting comparison  
   * move every `LogInfo` output behind a switch (not to trigger accidentally lots of output through the MessageLogger)
   * enforce the possibility to handle multiple runs on DATA validations
   * update reference file to phase-I simulation (to be updated when fixed geometry samples in 92x become available)
title: [92X] PrimaryVertexValidation Updates
